titleInfo.title: TISSUE ENGINEERING OF VALVED VENOUS CONDUITS (VVC) VERSUS CONSERVATIVE THERAPY IN PATIENTS WITH CHRONIC VENOUS INSUFFICIENCY (CVI). A DECISION ANALYTIC MODEL USING EXPERT ESTIMATED UTILITIES BASED ON DERIVED DATA FROM ANIMAL STUDIES AS A PRE-MARKETING TECHNOLOGY ASSESSMENT APPROACH WITH GERMAN DATA

bibliographicCitation.dgps: Dintsios, C.M., Hagen, A., Gerhardus, A. & Krauth, C. (2008). TISSUE ENGINEERING OF VALVED VENOUS CONDUITS (VVC) VERSUS CONSERVATIVE THERAPY IN PATIENTS WITH CHRONIC VENOUS INSUFFICIENCY (CVI). A DECISION ANALYTIC MODEL USING EXPERT ESTIMATED UTILITIES BASED ON DERIVED DATA FROM ANIMAL STUDIES AS A PRE-MARKETING TECHNOLOGY ASSESSMENT APPROACH WITH GERMAN DATA (VALUE IN HEALTH) (S. A406-A406). BLACKWELL PUBLISHING. doi:10.1016/S1098-3015(10)66378-4.
